addInputToForm

private void addInputToForm(java.lang.String in,
                            Form form)
Add an INPUT field to the specified Form.

Parameters:
in - The (X)HTML code of the INPUT field.
form - The Form to attach to.

scanForms

private boolean scanForms(java.lang.String uri)
Scans the given URI for HTML forms. Loads the first one into form for further use.

Parameters:
uri - The URI to scan. This is converted to URL.
Returns:
TRUE if a form was successfully loaded, FALSE if no form was found or an error occured.

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main entry point.
